20101226140012.000|20101226140014.000|TR0|light throwing the ball to
20101226140014.000|20101226140016.000|TR0|Russia. Moscow has already given
20101226140016.000|20101226140018.000|TR0|its initial approval to a treaty
20101226140018.000|20101226140020.000|TR0|which will see nuclear arsenals
20101226140020.000|20101226140022.000|TR0|slashed by a third.
20101226140022.000|20101226140024.000|TR0|
20101226140024.000|20101226140026.000|TR0|Threats and accusations between
20101226140026.000|20101226140028.000|TR0|North and South Korea. Seoul's
20101226140028.000|20101226140030.000|TR0|on-going war games close to the
20101226140030.000|20101226140032.000|TR0|border provokes Pyongyang into
20101226140032.000|20101226140034.000|TR0|threats of a sacred nuclear war.
20101226140034.000|20101226140036.000|TR0|
20101226140036.000|20101226140038.000|TR0|Open and thorough - Aviation
20101226140038.000|20101226140040.500|TR0|experts back Moscow's report
20101226140040.500|20101226140043.000|TR0|into the April plane crash that
20101226140043.000|20101226140045.500|TR0|killed the Polish president and
20101226140045.500|20101226140048.000|TR0|95 others. But Poland refuses to
20101226140048.000|20101226140050.000|TR0|accept the findings.
20101226140050.000|20101226140052.000|TR0|
20101226140052.000|20101226140054.000|TR0|And happening right now ...

20101226140056.000|20101226140058.000|TR0|Freezing rain causes major

20101226140112.000|20101226140114.000|TR0|After months of delay, a
20101226140114.000|20101226140116.000|TR0|landmark nuclear cuts deal
20101226140116.000|20101226140118.000|TR0|between Russia and the U.S. is
20101226140118.000|20101226140120.000|TR0|on the verge of being brought
20101226140120.000|20101226140122.000|TR0|into force.
20101226140122.000|20101226140124.000|TR0|
20101226140124.000|20101226140126.000|TR0|This week the new strategic arms
20101226140126.000|20101226140128.000|TR0|reduction treaty - or START -
20101226140128.000|20101226140130.500|TR0|was approved by both Russian and
20101226140130.500|20101226140133.000|TR0|American lawmakers...
20101226140133.000|20101226140135.500|TR0|
20101226140135.500|20101226140138.000|TR0|[[VO]]
20101226140138.000|20101226140140.000|TR0|
20101226140140.000|20101226140142.000|TR0|The State Duma - the lower house
20101226140142.000|20101226140144.000|TR0|of Russia's Parliament - voted
20101226140144.000|20101226140146.000|TR0|in favour of the treaty, and is
20101226140146.000|20101226140148.000|TR0|likely to ratify it after the
20101226140148.000|20101226140150.000|TR0|New Year holidays.
20101226140150.000|20101226140152.000|TR0|
20101226140152.000|20101226140154.000|TR0|The agreement will face further
20101226140154.000|20101226140156.000|TR0|review before the final vote.
20101226140156.000|20101226140158.000|TR0|
20101226140158.000|20101226140200.000|TR0|START will slash the deployed
20101226140200.000|20101226140202.000|TR0|Russian and American nuclear
20101226140202.000|20101226140204.000|TR0|arsenals by a third - once
20101226140204.000|20101226140206.000|TR0|ratified by both sides.
20101226140206.000|20101226140208.000|TR0|
20101226140208.000|20101226140210.000|TR0|It was actually signed by the

20101226140212.000|20101226140214.000|TR0|U.S. Senate only approved the

20101226140338.000|20101226140340.000|TR0|Both states have some very
20101226140340.000|20101226140342.000|TR0|significant reductions underway:
20101226140342.000|20101226140344.000|TR0|over the next ten years the
20101226140344.000|20101226140346.000|TR0|countries will cut their nuclear
20101226140346.000|20101226140348.000|TR0|arsenals by a third, down to NO
20101226140348.000|20101226140350.000|TR0|more than 1550 deployed warheads
20101226140350.000|20101226140352.000|TR0|on each side. The deal also
20101226140352.000|20101226140354.000|TR0|limits the number of delivery
20101226140354.000|20101226140356.000|TR0|vehicles and launchers.
20101226140356.000|20101226140358.000|TR0|
20101226140358.000|20101226140400.000|TR0|But even with those cuts, both
20101226140400.000|20101226140402.000|TR0|Russia and the U.S. will still
20101226140402.000|20101226140404.000|TR0|hold more than 90 percent of the
20101226140404.000|20101226140406.000|TR0|worlds nuclear weapons.

20101226141008.000|20101226141010.000|TR0|In North Korea, soldiers who
20101226141010.000|20101226141012.000|TR0|reportedly took part in the

20101226142758.000|20101226142800.500|TR0|
20101226142800.500|20101226142803.000|TR0|{no loc at 01min:14!!!!}
20101226142803.000|20101226142805.500|TR0|
20101226142805.500|20101226142808.000|TR0|The problem dates back more than
20101226142808.000|20101226142810.000|TR0|70 years when sign language was
20101226142810.000|20101226142812.000|TR0|banned from Soviet schools. In

20101226142820.000|20101226142822.000|TR0|its not a primitive way of

20101226142828.000|20101226142830.000|TR0|anything.

20101226142834.000|20101226142836.000|TR0|skies are my roof. My duty is to
20101226142836.000|20101226142838.000|TR0|help other people become happy.
20101226142838.000|20101226142840.000|TR0|
20101226142840.000|20101226142842.000|TR0|The head of the All-Russian
